thread.title: MK
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by MK

author: MK
title: MK
text:
I bought Barbour's classic Beufort - olive colour, with a hood.
Had only 5 days in London, so I was sensitive about the delivery time.
If you're in England, there's nothing to worry about the delivery.
I bought it Sunday afternoon, came at Tuesday morning.
Very satisfied about the speed. Thnx!
